text: My rasskazyvayem tebe (o Mukhammad!) ob obitatelyakh seleniy, kotoryye sushchestvovali davno, i v rasskazakh etikh soderzhatsya uveshchevaniya i poucheniya. K obitatelyam tekh seleniy prikhodili Nashi poslanniki s yasnymi znameniyami, no oni ne uverovali po privychke ne verit' Nashim poslannikam i otkazyvalis' ot pryamogo puti. Tak zapechatyvayet Allakh serdtsa i razum nechestivykh, i ot nikh budet skryt pryamoy put' k istine, i oni sbivayutsya s etogo puti
